docs.snippet: The beleaguered European Union faces a series of critical tests in 2017, but none is more important than the French presidential election, with a fierce opponent of the bloc a leading contender....
docs.lead_paragraph: The beleaguered European Union faces a series of critical tests in 2017, but none is more important than the French presidential election, with a fierce opponent of the bloc a leading contender.

headline.main: E.U. Faces Its Next Big Test as France’s Election Looms
headline.print_headline: After ‘Brexit,’ France Is E.U.’s Next Test

docs.snippet: The art market on Monday night felt the first effects of Britain’s momentous “Brexit” vote when Phillips held an auction of 20th-century and contemporary art....
docs.lead_paragraph: The art market on Monday night felt the first effects of Britain’s momentous “Brexit” vote when Phillips held an auction of 20th-century and contemporary art.
docs.abstract: Contemporary and 20th-century art sold at Phillips auction house in London exceeds projected estimate of 10.2 million British pounds and manages to raise 11.9 million with fees in spite of fluctuating financial market following Brexit vote.

headline.main: With Phillips Auction, Art Market Feels Effects of ‘Brexit’

docs.snippet: The British parliament's vote on Wednesday to back Prime Minister Theresa May's plan to trigger Brexit by end-March is "highly significant" to the legal battle over who has the power to authorize the step, a government lawyer said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The British parliament's vote on Wednesday to back Prime Minister Theresa May's plan to trigger Brexit by end-March is "highly significant" to the legal battle over who has the power to authorize the step, a government lawyer said on Thursday.

headline.main: Parliament Vote on Brexit Trigger 'Highly Significant' to Legal Battle: Government Lawyer
headline.print_headline: Parliament Vote on Brexit Trigger 'Highly Significant' to Legal Battle: Government Lawyer
